TopicTitle: In Space, no one can here you say "Hello"

Articles.Content:
Hello fellow astronautic engineers and pilots.

Welcome! Don't worry, lots of players joined less than two months ago when 1.0 was released, damn for the nth time I wish I could launch model rockets.

Not yet great successes, but hope to be on the way. Patience is word of a wise engineer ! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
